host_header column was added to upstreams
SELECT data_type FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'upstreams' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'host_header'
run_on column was dropped from plugins
SELECT data_type FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_CATALOG = 'kong' AND TABLE_NAME = 'plugins' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'run_on'
SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_CATALOG = 'kong' AND TABLE_NAME = 'cluster_ca'
